sourcesContent:
<template>
    <a-row :gutter="gutter">
        <a-col :span="24">
            <a-card :bordered="false" class="margin-bottom-lg">
                <a-form layout="inline">
                    <a-form-item label="分类">
                        <TagGroup :tags="typeTags" @change="bindClickChange"/>
                    </a-form-item>
                    <a-divider dashed style="margin: 8px 0"/>
                    <a-form-item label="时间">
                        <TagGroup :tags="dateTags" @change="bindClickChange"/>
                    </a-form-item>
                    <a-divider dashed style="margin: 8px 0"/>
                    <a-form-item label="其他">
                        <TagGroup :tags="otherTags" @change="bindClickChange"/>
                    </a-form-item>
                </a-form>
            </a-card>
        </a-col>
        <a-col :span="24">
            <Tips class="margin-bottom"/>

            <a-card :bordered="false" class="margin-bottom-lg">
                <a-list itemLayout="vertical" size="large">
                    <a-list-item v-for="(notification, index) in notifications" :key="index">
                        <a-list-item-meta :title="notification.title">
                            <template slot="description">
                                <a-tag>{{notification.type}}</a-tag>
                            </template>
                        </a-list-item-meta>
                        <Article :sometime="notification.dateTime">
                            <template slot="content">{{notification.content}}</template>
                        </Article>
                    </a-list-item>
                </a-list>
            </a-card>
        </a-col>
    </a-row>
</template>

<script>
    import {Article, TagGroup, Tips} from '@/components';

    let typeTags = ['私信', '系统通知', '账户通知', '消息通知'],
        dateTags = ['今天', '近一周', '近一个月', '近一季度', '近一年'],
        otherTags = ['已读', '未读', '已完成', '未完成'],
        notifications = [
            {
                title: '您有新的外卖订单，请注意查收！',
                type: '消息通知',
                content: ' Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Adipisci atque blanditiis dolor eius exiure laborum modi mollitia omnis recusandae? Adipisci iure laborum magnam minus necessitatibus possimus sint temporibus voluptatibus.',
                dateTime: '2019-08-29 09:56:08'
            },
            {
                title: 'Hi，小哥哥我关注你很久了！',
                type: '私信',
                content: ' Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Adipisci atque blanditiis dolor eius exiure laborum modi mollitia omnis recusandae? Adipisci iure laborum magnam minus necessitatibus possimus sint temporibus voluptatibus.',
                dateTime: '2019-09-08 18:23:45'
            },
            {
                title: '异地登录',
                type: '账户通知',
                content: ' Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Adipisci atque blanditiis dolor eius exiure laborum modi mollitia omnis recusandae? Adipisci iure laborum magnam minus necessitatibus possimus sint temporibus voluptatibus.',
                dateTime: '2018-06-07 12:45:16'
            },
            {
                title: '新应用审核，请尽快处理！',
                type: '系统消息',
                content: ' Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Adipisci atque blanditiis dolor eius exiure laborum modi mollitia omnis recusandae? Adipisci iure laborum magnam minus necessitatibus possimus sint temporibus voluptatibus.',
                dateTime: '2019-07-12 14:39:46'
            },
        ];

    export default {
        name: "Message",
        inject: ['gutter'],
        components: {Article, TagGroup, Tips},
        data() {
            return {
                typeTags,
                dateTags,
                otherTags,
                notifications
            }
        },
        methods: {
            bindClickChange() {
            }
        }
    }
</script>
